text: These five generals represent the best of the best - the finest commanders in your ranks. With courage, capability, efficiency, resourcefulness and prowess, these veteran officers will help you win even on multiple fronts.
These roaring tigers represent the most powerful, the most fierce, the most stalwart, most loyal and most honourable warriors you have in your service. Use them wisely.

The Four Hebei Elite represent the greatest warriors the north has to offer, with reputations that put fear in the hearts of even faraway souls. Truly, they are the four pillars that hold up your state.
